attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am urging the Government to stop using the expression (we are doing this) "to help families" and instead to say "to help people".
A family consists of one or more parents and their children and this defination excludes many citizens - from young people in care to pensioners living on their own - not to mention the great number of single people in between and partnerships witout children.
I'm sure this is not intentional but its effect is to make many of us feel excluded.
